description: Will contain Electronic Visit Verification data and documentation for each visit.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: EVV_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The EVV trigger, such as the start of end of the visit, for the corresponding line in the related item.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


NFC Scan In


NFC Scan Out


Start Visit


End Visit


Other NFC Scan

columns.name: EVV_FAIL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Describes how EVV failed on the client.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Location Services Failed


Location Outside Allowed Radius


Visit Time Later Than Scheduled Time


Visit Time Manually Entered (Mobile)


Visit Time Manually Entered (Remote Client)


Aggregator Rejected Submission (Needs Addendum)


Visit Duration Does Not Match Scheduled Visit Duration


Visit Time Earlier Than Scheduled Time

columns.name: EVV_RSN_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason code to justify the change made to override the EVV failure.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Mobile Device Issues


Mobile Device Captured Incorrect Location


Mobile Device Not Charged


Mobile Device Missing


Mobile Device Requested


Mobile App Issues/Inoperable


No Cell Coverage


Other


Provider Error


Provider Failed to Document Start Visit - Services Delivered


Provider Failed to Document End Visit - Services Delivered


Provider Failed to Document Start or End Visit - Services Delivered


Provider Failed to Document Start and End Visit - Services Delivered


Provider Documented Visit Start/End too Late/Early


Data Entry Error


Scheduling Error


Duplicate Entry


Service Provided Outside Home


Service Provided at an Alternate Location - Services Delivered


Wrong Type of Service Selected


Wrong Patient Selected


Unsafe Environment


Emergency


Natural/Public Health Disaster


Visit Extended by Patient Request


Visit Shortened by Patient Request


Patient Refused Service


No One Answered Locked Door


Patient Discharged


Legal Designee Refused Service


Patient Unavailable


Patient Not Home


Patient Removed From Home By Family


Patient in Hospital


Patient Expired


Unscheduled Visit (Confirmed)


Provider Service Not Per Patient


Provider No Show


Provider Change


Provider Unable to Use Mobile Device


Administrative Delay


Retroactive Coverage Addition


Retroactive Payor Change


Manual Entry of EVV


Verification Attempt Failed


Group Visit


Split Visit - Overtime


Split Visit - Multiple Programs


Split Visit - Home Care Attendant


No Orders - Not Billable


Provider ID Not Entered


Invalid Provider ID


EVV System Failure


Type of Service Not Selected


Patient Requested Visit Change/Cancellation


Visit Cancelled - Patient's Services Suspended

columns.name: EVV_RSN_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of reason code, and whether the code was entered on mobile or through the Remote Client.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


General


Location


Scheduled Time


Administrative


Duration

columns.name: EVV_RES_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The resolution code corresponding to the actions taken to override the EVV failure.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Changed verification collection method and documented


Written documentation maintained


Visit Rescheduled within 2 hours


Visit Rescheduled within 24 hours


Visit Rescheduled within 48 hours


Next Scheduled Visit


Non-Paid Caregiver


New attendant assigned to Patient


Visit has been rescheduled


Services canceled or suspended until further notice


Updated patient's address and documented


Change in schedule


Other

columns.name: EVV_EXC_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The exception code to be acknowledged corresponding to the EVV failure.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unknown Client


Unknown Employee


Visit Without Any Calls


Visit Without In-Calls


Visit Without Out-Calls


Unscheduled Visit


Unmatched Client ID/Phone


GPS Distance Exception


Service Verification Exception


Visit Verification Exception


Client Signature Exception


Late In Call


Early Out Call


Short Visit


No Show


Missing Service


Employee Speaker Verification


Invalid Service


Location Required

columns.name: EVV_FAIL_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the source of the EVV failure for the corresponding line in the related group.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Calculated


User Input
